name: The Rolling Ball - iPad /  iPhone / Tablet video game app
blurb: Stress reducing game where you are a Giant Ball rolling down the street. You roll over people, dogs, cats and destroy everything.

rewards.reward: You will receive one free copy of the game.\r\n\r\nWe will consider suggestions for characters,locations and storefronts.

You will receive videos of the game as it is developed and have the opportunity to provide feedback and suggestions.\r\n\r\nYou can suggest cities to destroy as well as things you would like to see crushed like types of cars and buildings as well descriptions of people (maybe your thinking of someone).
Send us a picture and we will model one of the characters based on your face and body. \r\n\r\nBecome a character in this hilariously addictive game.

You will receive 2 free copies of the final game for you and your friends.

You will have the opportunity to contribute your own voice and sounds such as one of the people screaming as they run away from the giant ball and "ouch" sounds after they are crushed.  
You can even send us your dog's sounds, cat's sounds, or even baby's sounds.  But don't worry. No babies will be crushed in this game.  Baby carriages and strollers can be crushed but the baby always crawls away safely.

Remember, this is a fun and playful family game for everyone.

All of the above plus we will name one of the characters after you or someone of your choosing.

You can send us your own voice recording or just send us the name you want us to use and we will record it for you.

For example, you might hear:

"Get out of the way, Ralphie!", 
"Fred, hellllp", 
"Johnny, it's coming your way!".

Send us a picture and we will model the character with your face and body, and name.

Be a part of this hilariously exciting game.

All of the above plus you can place your business' sign or logo on one of the streets.

This is a great way to get endless advertisement and to promote your brand!

Millions of people will download the free version and play it many times.  Be the first to lock in this reward.

All of the above plus you will receive up to 20 free copies for you and your friends. 

You will receive special thanks in the end credits. 

You can pick which city and streets you would like the ball to roll through in future versions.

All of the above, plus you can also name a select business along the street to represent your favorite (or least favorite) place.\r\n\r\nThis is a great way to get endless advertisement for your business.

All of the above and get this:  We will place a sign or logo of your choosing (your business, your name, your wife's name) on the very first street of the Free version.  This will guarantee that millions of people will see your sign as they have fun, running people over with a giant ball.  Hurry now, there is only room for a few signs on this street.  You can choose to put 1 sign on the main street or place a sign on 3 other streets of the first city.
All of the above and dinner at my house with my famous Baked Ziti.
